text: Hey team, looking to work with Christopher Lee for Queen Fine Foods. Budget is approx $12,689 - need 2 x 90-second product demo, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x Twitter post, 3 x Instagram story, 3 x Social media takeover. 9 weeks exclusivity, 3 month engagement. Usage: 8 months. Start date: December 2025.
